author: UniMatrix
title: Ah, the memories
review:
This was the set that started it all. I got it for my 12th birthday in a time when Lego was quite rare where I lived, and it has been joined by many subsequent sets over the following years.

I give it a subjective 10 points out of 10 since without it I might have never been introduced to Lego at such an impressionable age.

As for the set itself, it is a typical small sports car without a minifigure. The build is easy and the playability is what you would expect from something as simple. As for parts, the 2 light grey hinge pieces were my favourites for my pre dark ages MOCs.
